name: stats

stat-query-type.description: Stat query type [device|fortiswitch_client|forticlient]. Default is device.

stat-key.description: key of the stats count on [os_name|hardware_type|detected_interface|is_online|max_vuln_level|fortiswitch_id|fortiswitch_port_name]. fortiswitch_id and fortiswitch_port_name only for fortiswitch_client stats query type

timestamp_from.description: To get entries since the timestamp for stats query.

timestamp_to.description: To get entries before the timestamp for stats query.

filters.description: A list of filters. Type:{"type": string, "value": string, "op": string}. Only is_online type is supported. Op: filter operator [exact|contains]. Default is exact.

filter_logic.description: The logic between filters [and|or]). Default is and.

GET.summary:
Retrieve user devices stats from device store by given stat item.
Access Group: authgrp

help: Retrieve user devices stats from device store by given stat item.

chart-value.name: chart-value
chart-value.title: Chart Value
chart-value.description: A plain value of the statistics item.

chart-count.name: chart-count
chart-count.title: Chart Count
chart-count.description: Number of occurrences of the value.

response_description: A list of seen value and count pair by given statistics item name.

stat-query-type.name: stat-query-type
stat-query-type.summary: Stat query type [device|fortiswitch_client|forticlient]. Default is device.

stat-key.name: stat-key
stat-key.summary: key of the stats count on [os_name|hardware_type|detected_interface|is_online|max_vuln_level|fortiswitch_id|fortiswitch_port_name]. fortiswitch_id and fortiswitch_port_name only for fortiswitch_client stats query type

timestamp_from.name: timestamp_from
timestamp_from.summary: To get entries since the timestamp for stats query.

timestamp_to.name: timestamp_to
timestamp_to.summary: To get entries before the timestamp for stats query.

filters.name: filters
filters.summary: A list of filters. Type:{"type": string, "value": string, "op": string}. Only is_online type is supported. Op: filter operator [exact|contains]. Default is exact.

filter_logic.name: filter_logic
filter_logic.summary: The logic between filters [and|or]). Default is and.
